meanings.definition: A hollow form or matrix for giving a particular shape to something in a molten or plastic state.
meanings.sent1: The baker used molds to shape the cookies.
meanings.sent2: The artist poured the liquid chocolate into the molds.
meanings.sent3: The molds for the jello were feeling quite important.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity molds the world around her.
meanings.sent5: The molds created perfect replicas of the dinosaur bones.

meanings.definition: A frame or model around or on which something is formed or shaped.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter built wooden molds for the concrete.
meanings.sent2: The potter placed the clay in the molds to make vases.
meanings.sent3: The molds for the gingerbread house were having a party.
meanings.sent4: His guidance acts as a mold for their future decisions.
meanings.sent5: The molds held the hot metal until it cooled into shape.

meanings.definition: A distinctive and typical style, form, or character.
meanings.sent1: Her fashion sense molds her unique style.
meanings.sent2: The architect's design reflects his artistic molds.
meanings.sent3: The molds of the clouds in the sky looked like animals.
meanings.sent4: His leadership molds the team into a cohesive unit.
meanings.sent5: The molds of the old building showed its historical significance.
